eres a Health to the Company was a song about lovers and companions parting that was performed and enjoyed in Faer√ªn.The title of the song is unknown, but the lyrics are very closely derived from the real-world folk song "Heres a Health to the Company". The name of its real counterpart is used for convenience.
thumb|300px|Lunasa (right) and Merlin (left) performing for no particular audience.
The song was performed as a duet by the bard Lunasa Eveningwood and her companion Merlin Fastfoot while they stayed at Beckside Castle in Cormyr one night during the late 15 century DR. They also sang The Crafty Maids Policy and The Mermaid together.
